verses.verse: And it came to pass <S%H7586><s%>, when Saul was returned <S%H7725><s%> from following <S%H310><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>, that it was told <S%H5046><s%> him <S%H559><s%>, saying, Behold <S%H1732><s%>, David is in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of En-gedi <S%H5872><s%>.

Then Saul <S%H7586><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> chosen <S%H977><s%> men <S%H376><s%> out of all Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and went <S%H3212><s%> to seek <S%H1245><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> and his men <S%H582><s%> upon <S%H6440><s%> the rocks <S%H6697><s%> of the wild goats <S%H3277><s%>.

And he came <S%H935><s%> to the sheepcotes <S%H1448><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%>, where was a cave <S%H4631><s%>; and Saul <S%H7586><s%> went in <S%H935><s%> to cover <S%H5526><s%> his feet <S%H7272><s%>. Now David <S%H1732><s%> and his men <S%H582><s%> were abiding <S%H3427><s%> in the innermost parts <S%H3411><s%> of the cave <S%H4631><s%>.

And the men <S%H582><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H3117><s%>, Behold, the day of which Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto thee <S%H5414><s%>, Behold, I will deliver thine enemy <S%H341><s%> into thy hand <S%H3027><s%>, and thou shalt do <S%H6213><s%> to him as it shall seem good <S%H3190><s%> unto thee <S%H5869><s%>. Then David <S%H1732><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%>, and cut off <S%H3772><s%> the skirt <S%H3671><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%>'s robe <S%H4598><s%> privily <S%H3909><s%>.
And it came to pass afterward <S%H310><s%>, that David <S%H1732><s%>'s heart <S%H3820><s%> smote <S%H5221><s%> him <S%H3772><s%>, because he had cut off Saul <S%H7586><s%>'s skirt <S%H3671><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto his men <S%H582><s%>, Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> forbid <S%H2486><s%> that I should do <S%H6213><s%> this thing <S%H1697><s%> unto my lord <S%H113><s%>, Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>'s anointed <S%H4899><s%>, to put forth <S%H7971><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%> against him <S%H3068><s%>, seeing he is Jehovah's anointed <S%H4899><s%>.

So David <S%H1732><s%> checked <S%H8156><s%> his men <S%H582><s%> with these words <S%H1697><s%>, and suffered <S%H5414><s%> them not to rise <S%H6965><s%> against Saul <S%H7586><s%>. And Saul <S%H7586><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> out of the cave <S%H4631><s%>, and went <S%H3212><s%> on his way <S%H1870><s%>.

David <S%H1732><s%> also arose <S%H6965><s%> afterward <S%H3318><s%>, and went out of the cave <S%H4631><s%>, and cried <S%H7121><s%> after <S%H310><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, My lord <S%H113><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>. And when Saul <S%H7586><s%> looked <S%H5027><s%> behind <S%H310><s%> him <S%H1732><s%>, David bowed <S%H6915><s%> with his face <S%H639><s%> to the earth <S%H776><s%>, and did obeisance <S%H7812><s%>.

And David <S%H1732><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Saul <S%H7586><s%>, Wherefore hearkenest <S%H8085><s%> thou to men <S%H120><s%>'s words <S%H1697><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Behold <S%H1732><s%>, David seeketh <S%H1245><s%> thy hurt <S%H7451><s%>?

Behold <S%H3117><s%>, this day thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> have seen <S%H7200><s%> how that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> had delivered <S%H5414><s%> thee to-day <S%H3117><s%> into my hand <S%H3027><s%> in the cave <S%H4631><s%>: and some bade <S%H559><s%> me kill <S%H2026><s%> thee <S%H2347><s%>; but mine eye spared thee <S%H559><s%>; and I said, I will not put forth <S%H7971><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%> against my lord <S%H113><s%>; for he is Jehovah <S%H113><s%>'s anointed <S%H4899><s%>.

Moreover <S%H1><s%>, my father, see <S%H7200><s%>, yea <S%H7200><s%>, see the skirt <S%H3671><s%> of thy robe <S%H4598><s%> in my hand <S%H3027><s%>; for in that I cut off <S%H3772><s%> the skirt <S%H3671><s%> of thy robe <S%H4598><s%>, and killed <S%H2026><s%> thee not <S%H3045><s%>, know thou and see <S%H7200><s%> that there is neither evil <S%H7451><s%> nor transgression <S%H6588><s%> in my hand <S%H3027><s%>, and I have not sinned <S%H2398><s%> against thee <S%H6658><s%>, though thou huntest after my life <S%H5315><s%> to take it <S%H3947><s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> judge <S%H8199><s%> between me and thee <S%H3068><s%>, and Jehovah avenge <S%H5358><s%> me of thee <S%H3027><s%>; but my hand shall not be upon thee.

As saith <S%H559><s%> the proverb <S%H4912><s%> of the ancients <S%H6931><s%>, Out of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> cometh <S%H3318><s%> forth wickedness <S%H7562><s%>; but my hand shall not be upon thee <S%H3027><s%>.

After <S%H310><s%> whom is the king <S%H4428><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> come out <S%H3318><s%>? after <S%H310><s%> whom dost thou pursue <S%H7291><s%>? after <S%H310><s%> a dead <S%H4191><s%> dog <S%H3611><s%>, after <S%H310><s%> a <S%H259><s%> flea <S%H6550><s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> therefore be judge <S%H1781><s%>, and give sentence <S%H8199><s%> between me and thee <S%H7200><s%>, and see, and plead <S%H7378><s%> my cause <S%H7379><s%>, and deliver <S%H8199><s%> me out of thy hand <S%H3027><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H1732><s%>, when David had made an end <S%H3615><s%> of speaking <S%H1696><s%> these words <S%H1697><s%> unto Saul <S%H7586><s%>, that Saul <S%H7586><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Is this thy voice <S%H6963><s%>, my son <S%H1121><s%> David <S%H1732><s%>? And Saul <S%H7586><s%> lifted up <S%H5375><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%>, and wept <S%H1058><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> to David <S%H1732><s%>, Thou art more righteous <S%H6662><s%> than I <S%H1580><s%>; for thou hast rendered unto me good <S%H2896><s%>, whereas I have rendered <S%H1580><s%> unto thee evil <S%H7451><s%>.

And thou hast declared <S%H5046><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> how that thou hast dealt <S%H6213><s%> well <S%H2896><s%> with me <S%H3068><s%>, forasmuch as when Jehovah had delivered <S%H5462><s%> me up into thy hand <S%H3027><s%>, thou killedst me not <S%H2026><s%>.

For if a man <S%H376><s%> find <S%H4672><s%> his enemy <S%H341><s%>, will he let him go <S%H7971><s%> well <S%H2896><s%> away <S%H1870><s%>? wherefore Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> reward <S%H7999><s%> thee good <S%H2896><s%> for that which thou hast done <S%H6213><s%> unto me this day <S%H3117><s%>.

And now <S%H3045><s%>, behold, I know that thou shalt surely <S%H4427><s%> be king <S%H4427><s%>, and that the kingdom <S%H4467><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall be established <S%H6965><s%> in thy hand <S%H3027><s%>.

Swear <S%H7650><s%> now therefore unto me by Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, that thou wilt not <S%H518><s%> cut off <S%H3772><s%> my seed <S%H2233><s%> after <S%H310><s%> me <S%H8045><s%>, and that thou wilt not destroy my name <S%H8034><s%> out of my father <S%H1><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%>.

And David <S%H1732><s%> sware <S%H7650><s%> unto Saul <S%H7586><s%>. And Saul <S%H7586><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> home <S%H1004><s%>; but David <S%H1732><s%> and his men <S%H582><s%> gat them up <S%H5927><s%> unto the stronghold <S%H4686><s%>.
